name: yincana-literaria-digital
description: Yincana Literaria Digital con React y TypeScript

scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) { fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); } fs.mkdirSync('dist');"
scripts.build:html: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); let html = fs.readFileSync('index.html', 'utf-8'); html = html.replace(/<script type=\"importmap\">[\s\S]*?<\/script>/gs, ''); html = html.replace('</body>', '<script src=\"./bundle.js\" defer><\/script>\n</body>'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.html', html);"
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:html && npm run build:js
